title: How to Add Check Boxes to Word: 10 Simple Steps

steps.title: Open a new file in Microsoft Word.
steps.content: Open a new file in Microsoft Word. Do so by opening the app shaped like a blue W . Then click on File in the menu bar at the top of the screen, and click on New Blank Document .

steps.title: Click on File in the menu bar and then Options in the menu.
steps.content: Click on File in the menu bar and then Options in the menu. On Mac, click on Word in the menu bar and then Preferencesâ€¦ in the menu.

steps.title: Click on Customize Ribbon and then Main Tabs in the "Customize the Ribbon:" drop-down menu."[1] X Research source
steps.content: Click on Customize Ribbon and then Main Tabs in the "Customize the Ribbon:" drop-down menu." [1] X Research source On Mac, click on Ribbon & Toolbar in the "Authoring and Proofing Tools" section of the dialog box, then click on the Ribbon tab at the top of the dialog box.

steps.title: Click on Developer.
steps.content: Click on Developer . It's a tab in the upper-right part of the window.

steps.title: Position the cursor where you'd like to insert the check box.
steps.content: Position the cursor where you'd like to insert the check box.

steps.title: Click on Check Box.
steps.content: Click on Check Box . It's in the menu bar at the top of the window.

steps.title: Add additional check boxes and text as needed.
steps.content: Add additional check boxes and text as needed.

steps.title: Lock the form.
steps.content: Lock the form. To do so, select the entire list, to be found in the Controls section on the Developer tab, then click on Group and Group . On Mac, click Protect Form in the Developer tab toolbar.
